entry.title: Game: Lego Marvel Super Heroes (WiiU, 2013)
entry.content:
Game: Lego Marvel Super Heroes (WiiU, 2013)20140711
We started this today and played for about two hours and did two
levels. My son loves it and we played all together as a family. It
was pretty cute. The game is very by-the-book, but it is
definitely okay.

Total time: 2:02
  • Video Games
  • Lego Marvel Super Heroes
  • WiiU
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (14)
entry.content:
Game: New Super Mario Brothers U (WiiU, 2012) (14)20140710
We finally played again and beat a bunch of levels up to the
second Soda Pop level. We couldn't find the third coin in the
Glacier ghost house after many tries though. :(

Total time: 10:55
  • Video Games
  • New Super Mario Brothers U
  • WiiU
  • 2012

entry.title: Game: Ten by Eight (Vita, 2013)
entry.content:
Game: Ten by Eight (Vita, 2013)20140709
I played this one time in Endless mode. I did 3 moves and got a
score of 42106 and got 108 tiles. I missed a stone block and died
though. It's very fun.

Total time: 0:20
  • Video Games
  • Ten by Eight
  • Vita
  • 2013

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 5 - Episode 1 - Buffy vs Dracula
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 5 - Episode 1 - Buffy vs Dracula20140709
I love how weird this episode is and how much of a parody of
Dracula it is, down to Xander eating bugs. It's awesome. I also
love how the episode clearly establishes that Dawn isn't there at
the beginning and then is there at the end.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 5 - Episode 1A - Judgment
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 5 - Episode 1A - Judgment20140709
It is nice to be back with the cast after a break. Cordy and
Darla are such babes. It's hilarious how Gunn meets the rest of
the group. And I'm excited to see the singer guy a lot more.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 5 - Episode 2 - Real Me
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 5 - Episode 2 - Real Me20140709
Dawn and Harmony are so great in this episode. I love how it is
like Dawn has always been there and there's a lot history between
her and the rest of the group. It's so clever.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Movie: Escape Plan, starring Sylvester Stallone (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: Escape Plan, starring Sylvester Stallone (2013)20140707
That was an awesome opening! And what a great reveal that they are
really on a boat. Arnold is a good casting for this movie. The
ending was pretty awesome too. Good movie! I'm surprised it was
rated R, I guess there was a lot of gore?
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: Red Dawn, starring Chris Hemsworth (2012) (2)
entry.content:
Movie: Red Dawn, starring Chris Hemsworth (2012) (2)20140705
This was a great movie to watch around the Fourth of July, because
it is so much about independence and ra-ra America. I think it is
done incredibly well. It's so crazy though how it is a story where
the heroes are terrorists using the same tactics as those in Iraq,
etc.
  • Movies
  • 2012

entry.title: Movie: Gravity, starring Sandra Bullock (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: Gravity, starring Sandra Bullock (2013)20140704
This was an amazing movie. It's so cool how small the cast is and
how intense each element of the story is.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: Rush, starring Chris Hemsworth and Daniel Bruhl (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: Rush, starring Chris Hemsworth and Daniel Bruhl (2013)20140702
It's strange that Hemsworth is billed first, because Niki is the
real star of the movie. His character is amazing... the hospital
scenes and the fourth race are crazy. I also love that James bashed
that dumb reporter in for him. Man. What an intense movie, it
almost makes me want to watch F1.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: 47 Ronin, starring Keanu Reeves (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: 47 Ronin, starring Keanu Reeves (2013)20140625
This was a very fun action movie. I liked the very slightly
mystical things, although I kind of wish Kai used his powers
more. That first giant beast was really awesome.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: Non-Stop, starring Liam Neeson (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Non-Stop, starring Liam Neeson (2014)20140624
This was an incredibly tense movie and it was very hard to tell who
was good and who wasn't. I never had doubt about Bill, but it was
very exciting. It feels a lot like Taken, which I think was
intentional. The plan of the villains was pretty lame, but still it
was cool. I feel like they never established who killed the captain
of the plane though... sequel?
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Dredd, starring Keith Urban (2012)
entry.content:
Movie: Dredd, starring Keith Urban (2012)20140623
This was a very neat version of Judge Dredd. I thought that
focusing the action on a single building, like The Raid, worked
really well. Olivia Thirlby was very good and I was amazed that
Keith Urban never took off his helmet once! Cersei was good too,
creepy and mean as usual!
  • Movies
  • 2012

entry.title: Movie: The Four Feathers, starring Heath Ledger (2002)
entry.content:
Movie: The Four Feathers, starring Heath Ledger (2002)20140623
I think this movie is so good. I love the setting and feel like the
actors do such a great job bringing their characters across. I
particularly like how honorable and good Harry is.
  • Movies
  • 2002

entry.title: Movie: Cast Away, starring Tom Hanks (2000)
entry.content:
Movie: Cast Away, starring Tom Hanks (2000)20140622
This is such an awesome movie. I forgot how much preamble there is
to him being stranded. It's so sad when he finally gets home and
his life is so intense on the island. Man. Wow.
  • Movies
  • 2000

Book: Thuvia, Maid of Mars, by Edgar Rice Burroughs (1920) (2)20140622

entry.title: Movie: Son of God, starring Diogo Morgado (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Son of God, starring Diogo Morgado (2014)20140622
This was a nice version of Jesus' story. I liked the framing of
John. I liked that they spent a lot of time on his teachings and
didn't make the Romans and Caiaphas out to be totally bad. My kids
liked the beginning and thought the Passion was pretty scary.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Walk of Shame, starring Elizabeth Banks (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: Walk of Shame, starring Elizabeth Banks (2014)20140622
This was a surprisingly funny movie and a lot different than what I
thought it was going be. I feel bad that everyone was so
judgmental of her, although I believe that it is a very accurate
portrayal of what would happen.
  • Movies
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Two Weeks Notice, starring Sandra Bullock (2002)
entry.content:
Movie: Two Weeks Notice, starring Sandra Bullock (2002)20140621
This is a cute movie. I quite like Hugh Grant and some of the
scenes have such great scenes of chemistry.
  • Movies
  • 2002

entry.title: Movie: The Wolf of Wall Street, starring Leonardo DiCaprio (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: The Wolf of Wall Street, starring Leonardo DiCaprio (2013)20140621
This was an intense... and incredibly vulgar movie. The story is
pretty amazing and Leo hit it out of the park. The way Jordan's
life fell apart and he destroyed himself was really sad though, but
had some poetic justice. I liked the final scene a lot for its darkness.
  • Movies
  • 2013
